mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_CD, C.USER_ID, P.PRO_NUM, P.PRO_NM, P.PRO_MAIN_IMG, C.BUY_COUNT, P.PRO_PRICE-(P.PRO_PRICE*(P.PRO_DISCOUNT/100)) AS DISCOUNT_PRICE FROM PRODUCT_TBL P INNER JOIN CART_TBL C ON P.PRO_NUM = C.PRO_NUM AND C.PRO_NUM = #{pro_num} AND C.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY C.CART_CD

SELECT C.CART_CD, C.USER_ID, P.PRO_NUM, P.PRO_NM, P.PRO_MAIN_IMG, C.BUY_COUNT, P.PRO_PRICE-(P.PRO_PRICE*(P.PRO_DISCOUNT/100)) AS DISCOUNT_PRICE FROM PRODUCT_TBL P INNER JOIN CART_TBL C ON P.PRO_NUM = C.PRO_NUM AND C.CART_CD = #{cart_cd} ORDER BY C.CART_CD

SELECT C.CART_CD, C.USER_ID, P.PRO_NUM, P.PRO_NM, P.PRO_MAIN_IMG, C.BUY_COUNT, P.PRO_PRICE-(P.PRO_PRICE*(P.PRO_DISCOUNT/100)) AS DISCOUNT_PRICE FROM PRODUCT_TBL P INNER JOIN CART_TBL C ON P.PRO_NUM = C.PRO_NUM AND C.CART_CD IN (${cart_cd}) ORDER BY C.CART_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_INFO (ORD_CD, USER_ID, ORD_NM, ZIP_NUM, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, TEL_PHONE, CELL_PHONE, PAY_AMOUNT, PAYMENT, PAY_NM, ORD_STATE) VALUES(#{ord_cd}, #{user_id}, #{ord_nm}, #{zip_num}, #{addr}, #{addr_dtl}, #{tel_phone}, #{cell_phone}, #{pay_amount}, #{payment}, #{pay_nm}, '입금대기중')

INSERT INTO ORDER_DTL (ORD_CD, PRO_NUM, BUY_COUNT, BUY_PRICE) SELECT #{ord_cd}, C.PRO_NUM, C.BUY_COUNT, (P.PRO_PRICE-(P.PRO_PRICE*(P.PRO_DISCOUNT/100)))*C.BUY_COUNT AS BUY_PRICE FROM CART_TBL C, PRODUCT_TBL P WHERE C.PRO_NUM = P.PRO_NUM AND C.CART_CD IN (${cart_cd})
